reviewtext: Just connect the router (CABLE MODEM /DSL), the computers and you're ready to surf !!!!!!!!!!!! ITs really easy to set up......It just take 5 or 6 minutes to make any changes in the configuration in case that your ISP requires them...It can work also as DHCP, that's a great point if youu're not an advanced user.Beleiveme, its a good deal !
